name: Ancient
leaderRules: This model can be attached to the following units: Assault Intercessor Squad, Desolation Squad, Devastator Squad, Hellblaster Squad, Infernus Squad, Intercessor Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad, Tactical Squad, Crusader Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad, Sword Brethren Squad, Inner Circle Companions, Deathwatch Veterans, Decimus Kill Team, Fortis Kill Team, Assault Squad, Crusader Squad (Legendary), Long Fangs, Vanguard Veteran Squad, Wolf Guard. You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one CAPTAIN, CHAPTER MASTER or LIEUTENANT model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.
leaderAbilities: Astartes Banner: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Astartes Banner
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Duty
abilities.description: While this model is within range of an objective marker and/or within 6" of the centre of the battlefield, this model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

wargearOptions.description: This modelâ€™s bolt rifle and close combat weapon can be replaced with 1 power weapon.
